project.objective: TheraPanacea seeks to provide digital, innovative, patient-specific, and adaptive radiotherapy treatment planning system. Our objectives are the following: (i) improve the quality of treatment towards increasing the survival rate, while (ii) reducing the side effects towards diminishing the disastrous long term radiation impact and (iii) improving the efficiency of device use towards increasing significantly the number of patients being treated.
project.title: Fast, Digital Adaptive Personalized Radiotherapy
